commit message: When returning to the main account list activity return to the same scroll position as we left

Added support for large screens

I used the 'Strategies for Android 1.5' guide here http://developer.android.com/guide/practices/screens-support-1.5.html
Save temporary files to the application directory (where the app has write access)

Fixed HTTPTransport.delete() by setting Content-Type to 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'.

I made a few other changes to the delete() method to ensure it bahaves correctly.
Issue #5: Made links on the Account Details page clickable
